summary: This bill, the 'Rebuild America’s Health Care Schools Act of 2025,' amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to adjust the allowable costs for nursing and allied health education programs. It defines what constitutes reasonable costs, including direct and indirect expenses, and clarifies the definition of 'related entity.' The bill also mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to issue rules for implementation and prohibits recoupment of certain costs from hospitals under Medicare, with provisions for refunds if recoupment occurred in the prior six years.
